channel.title: Anon elludes me...
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Anon elludes me..." - player, "Kurisu Ryu", is asking for a note page bingo.

item.title: Anon elludes me...
item.content:encoded:
hi. i've been asking here and there and practically everywhere, so i figured i'd add this to my list, ya know?

i would REALLY like someone to bingo me with a note page so i can FINALLY get Anonymous this season…. i've been asking for it since i was around lvl 20-something, but noone has. it might be that i'm a difficult bingo to track or something, but even people who said they would haven't done so yet and i kinda need Anon….

my BvS name is "Kurisu Ryu" and i'm in Blazon Village, so if you could look me up i'd appreciate it.

if you need me to return the favor, just drop me a line.

Thanks in advance!
